entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tuktoyaktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -38.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tuktoyaktuk Airport 3:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -38.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -42.5°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
